title: LF Plat 1+ to form team OCE
body:
Hey guys!

I am forming a team with the intention to compete in the OOL next split and am creating a team now in order to create a team environment focused on communication and improvement. In the meantime we will be climbing the ranked 5 ladder.

There will be a regular training schedule plus a master tier coach who is on/off depending on times.

Do not apply if you are not willing to dedicate yourself and your time to improving the team.

Post Below

IGN: Chert
